title: Fig and walnut cake
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) dried figs, chopped', '30g (1 oz) butter', '1 tsp bicarbonate of soda', '240ml (8 fl oz) boiling water', '140g (5 oz) light brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '280g (10 oz) plain flour', '2 tsp baking powder', '1 tsp ground mixed spice', '1/2 tsp ground cinnamon', '1 pinch of salt', '115 g (4 oz) chopped walnuts']
